title: Single Team Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have a live feed available (Prod or QA)
AND we are logged in to a Single Team account for one of the teams playing - see https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/2019+Commerce+Entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN we launch the associated feed matching our single team account
custom_expected: THEN playback launches to full screen

title: Wrong Team Launch - Same Game as Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have a live feed available (Prod or QA)
AND we are logged in to a Single Team account for one of the teams playing - see https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/2019+Commerce+Entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN we select the game tile for a game with the team playing (matching our single team account) AND we attempt to launch the other team's video/audio feed
custom_expected: THEN the feed will not launch AND a message indicates to the user a subscription or upgrade is required to view the content

custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN we select the game tile for a game (NOT matching our single team account)
custom_expected: THEN the feed will not launch AND a message indicates to the user a subscription or upgrade is required to view the content

custom_expected: THEN the audio player launches to full screen and the audio plays as expected

title: App Pages: Wired Connection Lost
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the MLB.TV App's menu pages
AND the device is connected to a wired network connection
AND the device's wireless configuration has NOT been set up
(Not applicable for Amazon FireStick or Android Nexus)
custom_steps:
WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall 
AND continue to attempt to navigate around the menu pages
custom_expected: THEN then a behavior and/or expected fail messages appear: SCORES: No game tiles appear. After loading icon, message states "An error occurred to retrieve today's games." VIDEOS: No video thumbnails appear. No messaging is observed. SETTINGS: Can still be accessed. No messaging is observed. NOTE: It is acceptable to observe the background image disappear. Also NOTE that they may add messaging to the other areas at some point: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MLBANDSTB-581

title: App Pages: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked)
custom_preconds: Setup Proxy network (Charles or Network Link Conditioner)
custom_steps: WHEN we throttle the network to full block AND continue to attempt to navigate around the menu pages
custom_expected: THEN then a behavior and/or expected fail messages appear: SCORES: No game tiles appear. After loading icon, message states "An error occurred to retrieve today's games." VIDEOS: No video thumbnails appear. No messaging is observed. SETTINGS: Can still be accessed. No messaging is observed. NOTE: It is acceptable to observe the background image disappear. Also NOTE that they may add messaging to the other areas at some point: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MLBANDSTB-581

title: Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the device is connected to a wired network connection
AND the device's wireless configuration has NOT been set up
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears Currently this message is a FAIL: The MLB.tv App is temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any convenience. Please check back soon. [OK] https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MLBANDSTB-1220

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked)
custom_preconds: Setup Proxy network (Charles or Network Link Conditioner)
custom_steps: During playback, throttle network to full block
custom_expected: Buffer spinner appears within 15 seconds of freeze followed by Network error within 30-60 seconds of buffer (it is not required to show the message again during the current playback block if initial message is dismissed)

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations - Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is able to throttle stream via network link conditioner or Charles proxy
AND has launched an Archive Game
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the playback from launch that bandwidth/stream quality adapts up AND we then throttle down to 4000 kbps and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we then throttle down to 3000 kbps (app's minimum required) and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we then throttle down to 1800 kbps (below required) and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we release the throttle
custom_expected: THEN the bandwidth/stream quality to adapts as expected in each case AND at 3000 kbps and above the app does not stall at bitrate switching AND the bandwidth/stream quality returns to full once the throttle is released

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is able to throttle stream via network link conditioner or Charles proxy
AND has launched a Live Game
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the playback from launch that bandwidth/stream quality adapts up AND we then throttle down to 4000 kbps and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we then throttle down to 3000 kbps (app's minimum required) and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we then throttle down to 1800 kbps (below required) and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down AND we release the throttle note: FireStick 2nd gen is not pulling the 5k streams, due to video playback performance issues.
custom_expected: THEN the bandwidth/stream quality to adapts as expected in each case AND at 3000 kbps and above the app does not stall at bitrate switching AND the bandwidth/stream quality returns to full once the throttle is released note: audio player currently not displaying error messages when network is lost: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/MLBANDSTB-358

title: Network: Hard Data Drop - Archive

custom_steps:
WHEN we observe the playback from launch that bandwidth/stream quality adapts up 
AND we then throttle down to 1800 kbps and wait for bandwidth/stream quality to adapt down
custom_expected: THEN the app either switches bitrates seamlessly or buffers (15 seconds or less) and recovers

User logged in with an entitled account

2. Launch any VOD or live game that is not blacked out
